entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog at times. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
